title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\Tags
name: Tags
description:
A set of instance tags.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.Tags

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.fingerprint
params.description: Specifies a fingerprint for this request, which is essentially a hash of the tags' contents and used for optimistic locking. The fingerprint is initially generated by Compute Engine and changes after every request to modify or update tags. You must always provide an up-to-date fingerprint hash in order to update or change tags. To see the latest fingerprint, make get() request to the instance.

params.name: data.items
params.description: An array of tags. Each tag must be 1-63 characters long, and comply with RFC1035.

methods.description:
